properties.label: Type
properties.description: Choose the authentication type. Select 'None' if no authentication is necessary

properties.label: Api key location
properties.description: Choose type: Send API key in header or as query parameter.

properties.label: Oauth token endpoint
properties.description: The OAuth token endpoint

properties.label: Client id
properties.description: Your application's client ID from the OAuth client

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: Your application's client secret from the OAuth client

properties.label: Audience
properties.description: The unique identifier of the target API you want to access

properties.label: Client authentication
properties.description: Send client ID and client secret as Basic Auth request in the header, or as client credentials in the request body

properties.label: Scopes
properties.description: The scopes which you want to request authorization for (e.g.read:contacts)

properties.label: Headers
properties.description: Map of HTTP headers to add to the request

properties.label: Query parameters
properties.description: Map of query parameters to add to the request URL

properties.label: Connection timeout in seconds
properties.description: Sets the timeout in seconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout

properties.label: Request body
properties.description: Payload to send with the request

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
